page.title: 13LIVING IN CLEATOR MOOR cont
page.content: sixth form courses.There are about three hairdressers in Cleator Moor. They are Diane's Boutique,Curly Tops and Carol's.You would have to go to Whitehaven or to the Clinic to see about your teeth.You can not have hospital treatment in Cleator Moor but you can go to the Doctors.There are good services of buses to Ennerdale Whitehaven and Egremont from Cleator Moor.The nearest trains are in Whitehaven. Road egress from the area isn't very good. Roads are winding and narrow and the nearest access to the motorway system is the M6 at Penrith.
